name: ARMY Messenger
description:
ARMY Messenger is a fan-oriented calling & texting simulation app! Have you ever wished you could open your phone and call Jungkook, or send a quick text to Jimin? Well, now, talking with your bias is just a tap away!
Not only can you personally call & message your fav boy group members, but the members personally call & message you! Throughout the day, you'll receive text messages from all the members, and afterwards, you may receive a phone call too!

Don't forget that when you select your bias, he may have a special preference for you

***This app was made with the members' personalities in mind! All conversations stay true to the individual members

*This app contains FAKE SUBS!

Features:
* Incoming calls & customizable ringtone
* Receiving & sending text messages
* Real-time message notifications!
* Outgoing calls
* Contacts screen
* Hearts system & much, much more!

Enjoy!~
*just a disclaimer: This app is purely fictional and is not an official app made by "your fav boy group's" agency. It's fan-made! In other words, it's not really the members calling & texting you, but rather, a 100% fake and fictional simulation
